title: (x) Discover The Secrets - Classic Sans Serif {Steve Peter}
content:
Does anyone recognize this face? Itï¿½s an embedded font named Classic Sans Serif from a PDF that a customer sent to us. It looks very familiar, but I haven't found a likely match. I am guessing that it is a renamed version of a commercial face. Thanks!   
   
 ![Classic Sans Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130200im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/37501.jpg)
author: grant

comments.content: Found it, at [Keystrokes](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130200/http:/www.olena.com/fontsfordesign/preview.html) under the name [Classic Sans Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130200/http:/www.olena.com/fontsfordesign/previews/classicsans.html).

Steve, that's beautiful... nicely sleuthed.   
   
Thanks everyone.
